meanings.definition: A disease caused by a type of bacteria transmitted by ticks.
meanings.sent1: Anaplasmoses can be contracted from tick bites.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian diagnosed the cows with anaplasmoses.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined when everyone got anaplasmoses from tick bites!
meanings.sent4: The spread of anaplasmoses in the community was like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The severity of anaplasmoses made everyone take precautions against ticks.

meanings.sent1: The doctor discussed anaplasmoses with the patients.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied various cases of anaplasmoses.
meanings.sent3: At the zoo, the anaplasmoses of the giraffes were a topic of discussion.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with anaplasmoses of different opinions.
meanings.sent5: The anaplasmoses of ideas in the meeting led to a productive discussion.
